articles.author: Alex Woodward
articles.title: Fox News Dominion lawsuit – live: Network to benefit from tax write-off from $787m payout - The Independent
articles.description: Rupert Murdoch, Tucker Carlson, Sean Hannity and other big names have all avoided being called to testify over 2020 election lies
articles.content:
Trumps election lies cost Fox $787m will they also cost him the White House in 2024?
The Independents Andrew Feinberg writes:
For a good portion of the networks quarter-century on the air, Fox News… [+1016 chars]
